summary: A group of Russian teenagers spend their summer at a summer camp. Mitia falls in love and gets so occupied with his own problems that he forgets the others.
cast: Boris Tokarev|Tatyana Drubich|Irina Malysheva|Yuri Agilin|Nina Menshikova|Sergey Shakurov|Arina Aleynikova|Andrei Zvyagin|Yuriy Sorkiy|Tatyana Yurinova|Sergey Khlebnikov|Vera Blagovidova|O. Fedechkina|L. Fyodorova|T. Kaveshnikova|S. Lopukhov|Viktor Markin|I. Potolova
title: Sto dney posle detstva
